newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end up on institutional support.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end up on institutional support.

text.p: Institutional support helped Dhaka stocks making a quick recovery ahead of Friday weekend from a sharp drop in the previous session, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange benchmark index rose 16.81 points or 1.6 percent at 1,062.22 on a turnover of 47.4 million taka. Gainers led losers by 87 to 38. Brokers said institutional buying cushioned the market which experienced profit taking on financial, chemical and textile scrips for a second straight day.
Bangladesh Lamps rose 105 taka to 4,355, Altext Industries lost 1.42 to 66.11 and United Insurance was down 10 to 340.
